VII.i.2.E.12.d
.
Example:  DIC Eligibility Not Continuously Paid
Situation
:  A surviving spouse is in receipt of DIC.
In March 2020, the surviving spouse reported to VA that they had remarried on February 14, 2020, at the age of 55.
Result
:  Because the surviving spouse remarried upon attaining age 55, but before January 5, 2021, terminate entitlement to DIC effective February 14, 2020.  Reinstate DIC benefits effective January 5, 2021.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
